description: MCP tool call metrics, error rates, duration, request/response sizes, and traces for the Archestra platform

panels.description: Total cumulative requests across all MCP operations
Current request rate in requests per second
Average request payload size in bytes
Average operation duration across all MCP operations
Error percentage calculated over your selected dashboard time range
Average response payload size in bytes
Request patterns showing totals, rates, and error percentage over time
panels.title: Traffic Overview

panels.description: This panel shows detailed trace information for MCP Gateway requests, including agent names, MCP servers, tool names, and durations. Click on the View Trace link to see the complete trace visualization.

options.content:
> To View Traces:
>  1. Click a **Trace ID** in the table on the left (or paste a trace ID into the **Trace ID** variable above)
>  2. The trace view will load below

panels.description: This panel displays the selected trace visualization. Use the trace ID variable or click on traces in the table above to view detailed span information, timing, and request flow through your GenAI services.
Gauge showing performance status of tools

targets.expr: 100 - (100 * sum(mcp_tool_calls_total{status="error", agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}) / (sum(mcp_tool_calls_total{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}) + 1))

panels.title: Tool Health Gauge

panels.description: Number of unique tools currently active in the system
panels.title: Active Tools

panels.description: Total number of tool calls across all tools
panels.title: Total Tool Calls

panels.description: Comparison of request vs response payload sizes by tool

targets.expr: sum by (tool_name) (mcp_request_size_bytes_sum{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}) / sum by (tool_name) (mcp_request_size_bytes_count{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"})

sum by (tool_name) (mcp_response_size_bytes_sum{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}) / sum by (tool_name) (mcp_response_size_bytes_count{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"})

panels.title: Tool Payload Sizes

panels.description: Real-time tool call rates showing current activity
panels.title: Tool Call Rates

panels.description: Top 5 most frequently used tools by total calls
panels.title: Most Used Tools

panels.description: Top 5 slowest tools by average operation duration

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (tool_name) (mcp_tool_call_duration_seconds_sum{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}) / sum by (tool_name) (mcp_tool_call_duration_seconds_count{agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}))

panels.title: Slowest Tools by Duration

panels.description: Top 5 tools with highest error counts

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (tool_name) (mcp_tool_calls_total{status="error", agent_name=~"$agent_name", mcp_server_name=~"$mcp_server_name", tool_name=~"$tool_name"}))

panels.title: Most Failing Tools

title: Archestra MCP Monitoring
